page.title: 04EDUCATION IN BRORA
page.content: THE FOURTH SCHOOL IN BRORA IS NOT PART OF THE MAIN SCHOOL BUILDING.IT IS ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF BRORA AND IS A SPECIAL SCHOOL.IT IS FOR PEOPLE WITH MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISABLEMENTS,TO HELP THEM TO UNDERSTAND BASIC SKILLS FOR INSTANCE DOMESTIC CHORES FOR BOTH GIRLS AND BOYS.SIMPLE MATHEMATICS SUCH AS ADDING AND SUBTRACTING CAUSES A PROBLEM FOR BOTH TEACHERS AND PUPILS. TO BE A TEACHER IN ONE OF THESE SPECIAL SCHOOLS YOU MUST BE VERY PATIENT AND UNDERSTANDING WITH THE CHILDREN YOU ARE WORKING WITH.IT IS ALSO ESSENTIAL FOR THE TEACHERS NOT TO FAVOUR ONE CHILD MORE THAN ANOTHER.THE HEAD TEACHER IS MR.C MURRAY WHO IS ALSO THE EDUCATIONAL PSYCHOLOGIST FOR SUTHERLAND.
